verses:
A gradual canticle.  Out of the depths I have cried to thee, O
Lord:

Lord, hear my voice.  Let thy ears be attentive to the voice of
my supplication.
If thou, O Lord, wilt mark iniquities:  Lord, who shall stand it.

For with thee there is merciful forgiveness:  and by reason of
thy law, I have waited for thee, O Lord.  My soul hath relied on his
word:
my soul hath hoped in the Lord.

From the morning watch even until night, let Israel hope in the
Lord.

Because with the Lord there is mercy:  and with him plentiful
redemption.
And he shall redeem Israel from all his iniquities.
